data: It is the beginning of November—November in the Southern hemisphere, not the raw, foggy month of the North—November in Central Australia, where the sun rises hot and red in a breathless morn, and sinks at night in a heated haze, hovering around the level horizon.
November | Southern Hemisphere | North | Central Australia

It is the beginning of November--November in the Southern hemisphere, not the raw, foggy month of the North--November in Central Australia, where the sun rises hot and red in a breathless morn, and sinks at night in a heated haze, hovering around the level horizon.
The secret of the Australian desert
Favenc, Ernest, 1846-1908; Spence, Percy F. S. (Percy Frederick Seaton), 1868-1933 [Illustrator]
